bridge-type.label: RFXCOM Transceiver
bridge-type.description: This is universal RFXCOM transceiver bridge for manual configuration purposes.

parameter.name: serialPort
parameter.label: Serial Port
parameter.description: Serial port where RFXCOM transceiver is connected.

parameter.name: ignoreConfig
parameter.label: Ignore RFXCOM transceiver configuration
parameter.description: Fully ignore RFXCOM transceiver configuration. Binding assume that RFXCOM transceiver is preconfigured e.g. via RFXcom Manager.

parameter.name: setMode
parameter.description: RFXCOM transceiver set mode command. Command should be in hexadecimal string format and 28 characters (14 bytes) long. If set mode command is given, individual messages configurations are ignored.

parameter.name: transceiverType
parameter.description: RFXCOM transceiver type.
